full_text: Martin Shkreli, the so-called “pharma bro” who was widely criticized for raising the price of a lifesaving AIDS drug, has been released from federal prison https://t.co/LjW1oaIvok

localize.full_text: 救命エイズ薬の価格を引き上げたことで広く批判された、いわゆる「ファーマ・ブロー」のマーティン・シュクレリ氏が、連邦刑務所から釈放された https://t.co/LjW1oaIvok
